mapper.insert: insert into goodssystem.shop( shop_Name, shop_Class, shop_Admin, shop_State, shop_Address, shop_Concern, create_Time, update_Time) VALUES(#{shopName},#{shopClass},#{shop_Admin},#{shopAddress},#{shopConcern},#{createTime},#{updateTime});
mapper.update: update goodssystem.shop set shop_Concern=#{shopConcern} and shop_State=#{shopState} and shop_Name=#{shopName} and shop_Class=#{shopClass} and shop_Address=#{shop_Address} and update_Time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select id, shop_Name, shop_Class, shop_Admin, shop_State, shop_Address, shop_Concern, create_Time, update_Time from goodssystem.shop where id=#{id}
select id, shop_Name, shop_Class, shop_Admin, shop_State, shop_Address, shop_Concern, create_Time, update_Time from goodssystem.shop where shop_Admin=#{shopAdmin}
